<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Senior Rides">cc0c6611972ab110a160fbafe153af01</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Senior Rides Record Producer DOB Check</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   var yearOfBirth = g_form.getValue('date_of_birth');

   if(isNaN(yearOfBirth)) {
	alert("Please enter a numeric value.");
	return false;
   } else if((2023 - yearOfBirth) < 62) {
	alert("Sorry this service is only available to senior users.");
	return false;
   }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kahner</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-25 23:49:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>52f04228977ef110a160fbafe153afcc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Senior Rides Record Producer DOB Check</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Senior Rides" source="x_1128723_senior_0">6c3b547497623110a160fbafe153af13</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Senior Rides">6c3b547497623110a160fbafe153af13</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_52f04228977ef110a160fbafe153afcc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-25 23:55:02</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
